entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.8°C
entry.summary:

Condition: Mist
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 99 %

Wind: N 13 km/h

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
